about_the_game:
KOEI TECMO’s iconic franchise returns, and for a limited time, fans will be able to play through a free trial of this epic strategy experience. Gamers can choose to play as either the Cao Cao, Liu Bei, or Sun Jian faction through 36 turns (one year in game time). The trial will be available in English only, and won’t be available in the following regions: Japan, Korea, Mainland China, Taiwan, or Hong Kong.

Fans who play through the trial won’t be able to transfer save data into the full version, and since the game is still under development, the trial might have known bugs or errors that will be different from the final version of the game.

No customer support will be available for the trial, but if players have questions, please contact support@koeitecmoamerica.com

KOEI TECMO’s iconic franchise returns, and for a limited time, fans will be able to play through a free trial of this epic strategy experience. Gamers can choose to play as either the Cao Cao, Liu Bei, or Sun Jian faction through 36 turns (one year in game time). The trial will be available in English only, and won’t be available in the following regions: Japan, Korea, Mainland China, Taiwan, or Hong Kong.

Fans who play through the trial won’t be able to transfer save data into the full version, and since the game is still under development, the trial might have known bugs or errors that will be different from the final version of the game.

No customer support will be available for the trial, but if players have questions, please contact support@koeitecmoamerica.com

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV

name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX680
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

short_description: KOEI TECMO’s iconic franchise returns, and for a limited time, fans will be able to play through a free trial of this epic strategy experience.
